apps.name: Netatmo (Connect)
apps.description: Integrate your Netatmo devices with SmartThings

apps.name: Monitor on Sense
apps.description: Turn on switch when vibration is sensed

apps.name: Medicine Management - Contact Sensor
apps.description: This supports devices with capabilities of ContactSensor and ColorControl (LED). It sends an in-app and ambient light notification if you forget to open the drawer or cabinet where meds are stored. A reminder will be set to a single time per day. If the draw or cabinet isn't opened within 60 minutes of that reminder, an in-app message will be sent. If the draw or cabinet still isn't opened after an additional 10 minutes, then an LED light turns red until the draw or cabinet is opened

apps.name: Cameras On When I'm Away
apps.description: Turn cameras on when I'm away

apps.name: Let There Be Light!
apps.description: Turn your lights on when a SmartSense Multi is opened and turn them off when it is closed.

apps.name: Big Turn OFF
apps.description: Turn your lights off when the SmartApp is tapped or activated

apps.name: Logitech Harmony (Connect)
apps.description: Allows you to integrate your Logitech Harmony account with SmartThings.

apps.name: Medicine Management - Temp-Motion
apps.description: This only supports devices with capabilities TemperatureMeasurement, AccelerationSensor and ColorControl (LED). Supports two use cases. First, will notifies via in-app if the fridge where meds are stored exceeds a temperature threshold set in degrees. Secondly, sends an in-app and ambient light notification if you forget to take your meds by sensing movement of the medicine box in the fridge. A reminder will be set to a single time per day. If the box isn't moved within 60 minutes of that reminder, an in-app message will be sent. If the box still isn't moved after an additional 10 minutes, then an LED light turns red until the box is moved

apps.name: Feed My Pet
apps.description: Setup a schedule for when your pet is fed. Purchase any SmartThings certified pet food feeder and install the Feed My Pet app, and set the time. You and your pet are ready to go. Your life just got smarter.

apps.name: Wemo (Connect)
apps.description: Allows you to integrate your WeMo Switch and Wemo Motion sensor with SmartThings.

apps.name: Routine Director
apps.description: Monitor a set of presence sensors and activate routines based on whether your home is empty or occupied.  Each presence status change will check against the current 'sun state' to run routines based on occupancy and whether the sun is up or down.

apps.name: Flood Alert!
apps.description: Get a push notification or text message when water is detected where it doesn't belong.

apps.name: Smart Home Ventilation
apps.description: Allows for setting up various schedule scenarios for turning on and off home ventilation switches.

apps.name: Switch Activates Home Phrase or Mode
apps.description: Ties a Hello, Home phrase or mode to a switch's state. Perfect for use with IFTTT.

apps.name: When It's Going to Rain
apps.description: Is your shed closed? Are your windows shut? Is the grill covered? Are your dogs indoors? Will the lawn and plants need to be watered tomorrow?

apps.name: Jawbone Button Notifier
apps.description: Send push notifications or text messages with your Jawbone Up when you hold the button.

apps.name: Power Allowance
apps.description: Save energy or restrict total time an appliance (like a curling iron or TV) can be in use.  When a switch turns on, automatically turn it back off after a set number of minutes you specify.

apps.name: Mini Hue Controller
apps.description: Control one or more Hue bulbs using an Aeon MiniMote.

apps.name: Garage Door Opener
apps.description: Open your garage door when a switch is turned on.

apps.name: Close The Valve
apps.description: Close a selected valve if moisture is detected, and get notified by SMS and push notification.

apps.name: Switch Activates Home Phrase
apps.description: Ties a Hello, Home phrase to a switch's state. Perfect for use with IFTTT.

apps.name: Simple Sync Trigger
apps.description: Trigger Simple Control activities when certain actions take place in your home.

apps.name: My Light Toggle
apps.description: Toggle lights on/off with a motion sensor

apps.name: Habit Helper
apps.description: Add something you want to be reminded about each day and get a text message to help you form positive habits.

apps.name: Speaker Mood Music
apps.description: Plays a selected song or station.

apps.name: The Flasher
apps.description: Flashes a set of lights in response to motion, an open/close event, or a switch.

apps.name: Brighten My Path
apps.description: Turn your lights on when motion is detected.

apps.name: Simple Control
apps.description: Integrate SmartThings with your Simple Control activities.

apps.name: Shabbat and Holiday Modes
apps.description: Changes the mode at candle lighting and back after havdalah.  Uses the HebCal.com API to look for days that are shabbat or chag and pull real time candle lighting and havdalah times to change modes automatically

apps.name: Keep Me Cozy II
apps.description: Works the same as Keep Me Cozy, but enables you to pick an alternative temperature sensor in a separate space from the thermostat. Focuses on making you comfortable where you are spending your time rather than where the thermostat is located.

apps.name: Make It So
apps.description: Saves the states of a specified set switches and thermostat setpoints and restores them at each mode change. To use 1) Set the mode, 2) Change switches and setpoint to where you want them for that mode, and 3) Install or update the app. Changing to that mode or touching the app will set the devices to the saved state.

apps.name: Sonos Remote Control
apps.description: Control your Sonos system with an Aeon Minimote

apps.name: Wattvision Manager
apps.description: Monitor your whole-house energy use by connecting to your Wattvision account

apps.name: Tesla (Connect)
apps.description: Integrate your Tesla car with SmartThings.

apps.name: Notify Me When It Opens
apps.description: Get a push message sent to your phone when an open/close sensor is opened.

apps.name: Auto Humidity Vent
apps.description: When the humidity reaches a specified level, activate one or more vent fans until the humidity is reduced to a specified level.

apps.name: Life360 (Connect)
apps.description: Life360 Service Manager

apps.name: Presence Change Text
apps.description: Send me a text message when my presence status changes.

apps.name: Smart turn it on
apps.description: Turns on selected device(s) at a set time on selected days of the week only if a selected person is present and turns off selected device(s) after a set time.

apps.name: Jenkins Notifier
apps.description: Turn off and on devices based on the state that your Jenkins Build is in.

apps.name: Forgiving Security
apps.description: Alerts you if something happens while you're away.  Has a settable grace period to compensate for presence sensors that may take a few seconds to be noticed.

apps.name: Bright When Dark And/Or Bright After Sunset
apps.description: Turn ON light(s) and/or dimmer(s) when there's movement and the room is dark with illuminance threshold and/or between sunset and sunrise. Then turn OFF after X minute(s) when the brightness of the room is above the illuminance threshold or turn OFF after X minute(s) when there is no movement.

apps.name: Smart Windows
apps.description: Compares two temperatures – indoor vs outdoor, for example – then sends an alert if windows are open (or closed!). If you don't use an external temperature device, your location will be used instead.

apps.name: SmartBlock Manager
apps.description: A SmartApp for managing SmartBlocks

apps.name: Keep Me Cozy
apps.description: Changes your thermostat settings automatically in response to a mode change.  Often used with Bon Voyage, Rise and Shine, and other Mode Magic SmartApps to automatically keep you comfortable while you're present and save you energy and money while you are away.

apps.name: Good Night House
apps.description: Some on, some off with delay for bedtime, Lock The Doors

apps.name: Lights Off with No Motion and Presence
apps.description: Turn lights off when no motion and presence is detected for a set period of time.

apps.name: Coffee After Shower
apps.description: This app is designed simply to turn on your coffee machine while you are taking a shower.

apps.name: Greetings Earthling
apps.description: Monitors a set of presence detectors and triggers a mode change when someone arrives at home.

apps.name: Working From Home
apps.description: If after a particular time of day a certain person is still at home, trigger a 'Working From Home' action.

apps.name: Thermostat Mode Director
apps.description: Changes mode of your thermostat based on the temperature range of a specified temperature sensor and shuts off the thermostat if any windows/doors are open.

apps.name: LIFX (Connect)
apps.description: Allows you to use LIFX smart light bulbs with SmartThings.

apps.name: Vinli Home Connect
apps.description: Allows Vinli users to connect their car to SmartThings

apps.name: Turn It On For 5 Minutes
apps.description: When a SmartSense Multi is opened, a switch will be turned on, and then turned off after 5 minutes.

apps.name: SmartWeather Station Controller
apps.description: Updates SmartWeather Station Tile devices every hour.

apps.name: NFC Tag Toggle
apps.description: Allows toggling of a switch, lock, or garage door based on an NFC Tag touch event

apps.name: Ridiculously Automated Garage Door
apps.description: Monitors arrival and departure of car(s) and 1) opens door when car arrives, 2) closes door after car has departed (for N minutes), 3) opens door when car door motion is detected, 4) closes door when door was opened due to arrival and interior door is closed.

apps.name: Every Element
apps.description: Every element demonstration app

apps.name: Beacon Control
apps.description: Execute a Hello, Home phrase, turn on or off some lights, and/or lock or unlock your door when you enter or leave a monitored region

apps.name: Lock It When I Leave
apps.description: Locks a deadbolt or lever lock when a SmartSense Presence tag or smartphone leaves a location.

apps.name: Step Notifier
apps.description: Use a step tracker device to track daily step goals and trigger various device actions when your goals are met!

apps.name: Virtual Thermostat
apps.description: Control a space heater or window air conditioner in conjunction with any temperature sensor, like a SmartSense Multi.

apps.name: SmartBlock Notifier
apps.description: A SmartApp that notifies you when things are happening around your SmartBlocks

apps.name: Initial State Event Streamer
apps.description: A SmartThings SmartApp to allow SmartThings events to be viewable inside an Initial State Event Bucket in your https://www.initialstate.com account.

apps.name: Let There Be Dark!
apps.description: Turn your lights off when a Contact Sensor is opened and turn them back on when it is closed, ONLY if the Lights were previouly on

apps.name: Device Tile Controller
apps.description: A controller SmartApp to install virtual devices into your location in order to simulate various native Device Tiles.

apps.name: Elder Care: Daily Routine
apps.description: Stay connected to your loved ones. Get notified if they are not up and moving around by a specified time and/or if they have not opened a cabinet or door according to a set schedule.

apps.name: Left It Open
apps.description: Notifies you when you have left a door or window open longer that a specified amount of time.

apps.name: Quirky (Connect)
apps.description: Connect your Quirky to SmartThings.

apps.name: BeaconThings Manager
apps.description: SmartApp to interact with the BeaconThings iOS app. Use this app to integrate iBeacons into your smart home.

apps.name: Unlock It When I Arrive
apps.description: Unlocks the door when you arrive at your location.

apps.name: Mood Cube
apps.description: Set your lighting by rotating a cube containing a SmartSense Multi

apps.name: Weather Underground PWS Connect
apps.description: Connect your SmartSense Temp/Humidity sensor to your Weather Underground Personal Weather Station.

apps.name: Energy Alerts
apps.description: Get notified if you're using too much energy

apps.name: The Big Switch
apps.description: Turns on, off and dim a collection of lights based on the state of a specific switch.

apps.name: Lock it at a specific time
apps.description: Make sure a door is locked at a specific time.  Option to add door contact sensor to only lock if closed.

apps.name: Light Follows Me
apps.description: Turn your lights on when motion is detected and then off again once the motion stops for a set period of time.

apps.name: Switch Changes Mode
apps.description: Ties a mode to a switch's state. Perfect for use with IFTTT.

apps.name: Mail Arrived
apps.description: Send a text when mail arrives in your mailbox using a SmartSense Multi on your mailbox door. Note: battery life may be impacted in cold climates.

apps.name: Smart Light Timer, X minutes unless already on
apps.description: Turns on a switch for X minutes, then turns it off. Unless, the switch is already on, in which case it stays on. If the switch is toggled while the timer is running, the timer is canceled.

apps.name: Gideon Smart Home
apps.description: Gideon Smart Home SmartApp allows you to connect and control all of your SmartThings devices through the Gideon app, making your SmartThings devices even smarter.

apps.name: Ecobee (Connect)
apps.description: Connect your Ecobee thermostat to SmartThings.

apps.name: Goodnight Ubi
apps.description: An app to coordinate bedtime activities between Ubi and SmartThings.  This app will activate when a Virtual Tile is triggers (Setup custom behavior in Ubi to turn on this tile when you say goodnight to ubi).  This app will then turn off selected lights after a specified number of minutes.  It will also check if any doors or windows are open.  If they are, Ubi will tell you which ones are open.  Finally, the app will say goodnight to hello home if requested.

apps.name: Withings
apps.description: Connect your Withings scale to SmartThings.

apps.name: Smart Auto Lock / Unlock
apps.description: Automatically locks door X minutes after being closed and keeps door unlocked if door is open.

apps.name: SmartBlock Chat Sender
apps.description: Send chat messages into Minecraft via the SmartBlock mod

apps.name: WeatherBug Home
apps.description: WeatherBug Home

apps.name: It's Too Hot
apps.description: Monitor the temperature and when it rises above your setting get a notification and/or turn on an A/C unit or fan.

apps.name: Alfred Workflow
apps.description: This SmartApp allows you to interact with the things in your physical graph through Alfred.

apps.name: It Moved
apps.description: Send a text when movement is detected

apps.name: IFTTT
apps.description: Put the internet to work for you.

apps.name: Ready For Rain
apps.description: Warn if doors or windows are open when inclement weather is approaching.

apps.name: Tcp Bulbs (Connect)
apps.description: Connect your TCP bulbs to SmartThings using Cloud to Cloud integration. You must create a remote login acct on TCP Mobile App.

apps.name: Send HAM Bridge Command When
apps.description: Sends a command to your HAM Bridge server when SmartThings are activated.

apps.name: Door Knocker
apps.description: Alert if door is knocked, but not opened.

apps.name: Laundry Monitor
apps.description: Sends a message and (optionally) turns on or blinks a light to indicate that laundry is done.

apps.name: Text Me When It Opens
apps.description: Get a text message sent to your phone when an open/close sensor is opened.

apps.name: Text Me When There's Motion and I'm Not Here
apps.description: Send a text message when there is motion while you are away.

apps.name: Gentle Wake Up
apps.description: Dim your lights up slowly, allowing you to wake up more naturally.

apps.name: Color Coordinator
apps.description: Ties multiple colored lights to one specific light's settings

apps.name: Turn On Only If I Arrive After Sunset
apps.description: Turn something on only if you arrive after sunset and back off anytime you leave.

apps.name: Vacation Lighting Director
apps.description: Randomly turn on/off lights to simulate the appearance of a occupied home while you are away.

apps.name: Notify Me When
apps.description: Receive notifications when anything happens in your home.

apps.name: Good Night
apps.description: Changes mode when motion ceases after a specific time of night.

apps.name: Bose SoundTouch Control
apps.description: Control your Bose SoundTouch when certain actions take place in your home.

apps.name: Hue Mood Lighting
apps.description: Sets the colors and brightness level of your Philips Hue lights to match your mood.

apps.name: Undead Early Warning
apps.description: Undead Early Warning

apps.name: Curling Iron
apps.description: Turns on an outlet when the user is present and off after a period of time

apps.name: Smart Nightlight
apps.description: Turns on lights when it's dark and motion is detected. Turns lights off when it becomes light or some time after motion ceases.

apps.name: Smart Security
apps.description: Alerts you when there are intruders but not when you just got up for a glass of water in the middle of the night

apps.name: Hall Light: Welcome Home
apps.description: Turn on the hall light if someone comes home (presence) and the door opens.

apps.name: Sonos Music Modes
apps.description: Plays a different selected song or station for each mode.

apps.name: Gideon
apps.description: Gideon AI Smart app allows you to connect and control all of your SmartThings devices through the Gideon AI app, making your SmartThings devices even smarter.

apps.name: Withings Manager
apps.description: Connect With Withings

apps.name: Nobody Home
apps.description: When everyone leaves, change mode.  If at least one person home, switch mode based on sun position.

apps.name: Hello, Home Phrase Director
apps.description: Monitor a set of presence sensors and activate Hello, Home phrases based on whether your home is empty or occupied.  Each presence status change will check against the current 'sun state' to run phrases based on occupancy and whether the sun is up or down.

apps.name: Door State to Color Light (Hue Bulb)
apps.description: Change the color of your Hue bulbs based on your coop's door status.

apps.name: Big Turn ON
apps.description: Turn your lights on when the SmartApp is tapped or activated.

apps.name: It's Too Cold
apps.description: Monitor the temperature and when it drops below your setting get a text and/or turn on a heater or additional appliance.

apps.name: Notify Me With Hue
apps.description: Changes the color and brightness of Philips Hue bulbs when any of a variety of SmartThings is activated.  Supports motion, contact, acceleration, moisture and presence sensors as well as switches.

apps.name: Smart Alarm
apps.description: A multi-zone virtual alarm panel, featuring customizable security zones. Setting of an alarm can activate sirens, turn on light switches, push notification and text message. Alarm is armed and disarmed simply by setting SmartThings location 'mode'.

apps.name: Brighten Dark Places
apps.description: Turn your lights on when a open/close sensor opens and the space is dark.

apps.name: Smart Energy Service
apps.description: With visible realtime energy usage status, have good energy habits and enrich your life

apps.name: Turn Off With Motion
apps.description: Turns off a device if there is motion

apps.name: OpenT2T SmartApp Test
apps.description: Test app to test end to end SmartThings scenarios via OpenT2T

apps.name: Turn It On When I'm Here
apps.description: Turn something on when you arrive and back off when you leave.

apps.name: Sprayer Controller 2
apps.description: Control Sprayers for a period of time a number of times per hour

apps.name: Speaker Control
apps.description: Play or pause your Speaker when certain actions take place in your home.

apps.name: Carpool Notifier
apps.description: Send notifications to your carpooling buddies when you arrive to pick them up. If the person you are picking up is home, and has been for 5 minutes or more, they will get a notification when you arrive.

apps.name: Jawbone UP (Connect)
apps.description: Connect your Jawbone UP to SmartThings

apps.name: The Gun Case Moved
apps.description: Send a text when your gun case moves

apps.name: Darken Behind Me
apps.description: Turn your lights off after a period of no motion being observed.

apps.name: Medicine Reminder
apps.description: Set up a reminder so that if you forget to take your medicine (determined by whether a cabinet or drawer has been opened) by specified time you get a notification or text message.

apps.name: Lights Off, When Closed
apps.description: Turn your lights off when an open/close sensor closes.

apps.name: Sleepy Time
apps.description: Use Jawbone sleep mode events to automatically execute Hello, Home phrases. Automatially put the house to bed or wake it up in the morning by pushing the button on your UP.

apps.name: Button Controller
apps.description: Control devices with buttons like the Aeon Labs Minimote

apps.name: Severe Weather Alert
apps.description: Get a push notification when severe weather is in your area.

apps.name: Door Jammed Notification
apps.description: Sends a SmartThings notification and text messages when your CoopBoss detects a door jam.

apps.name: Dry the Wetspot
apps.description: Turns switch on and off based on moisture sensor input.

apps.name: Energy Saver
apps.description: Turn things off if you're using too much energy

apps.name: Has Barkley Been Fed?
apps.description: Setup a schedule to be reminded to feed your pet. Purchase any SmartThings certified pet food feeder and install the Feed My Pet app, and set the time. You and your pet are ready to go. Your life just got smarter.

apps.name: PlantLink Connector
apps.description: This SmartApp connects to myplantlink.com and forwards the device data to it so it can calculate easy to read plant status for your specific plant's needs.

apps.name: SmartBlock Linker
apps.description: A SmartApp that links SmartBlocks to switches

apps.name: Gidjit Hub
apps.description: Act as an endpoint so user's of Gidjit can quickly access and control their devices and execute routines. Users can do this quickly as Gidjit filters these actions  based on their environment

apps.name: Once a Day
apps.description: Turn on one or more switches at a specified time and turn them off at a later time.

apps.name: Photo Burst When...
apps.description: Take a burst of photos and send a push notification when...

apps.name: Speaker Notify with Sound
apps.description: Play a sound or custom message through your Speaker when the mode changes or other events occur.

apps.name: Lighting Director
apps.description: Control up to 4 sets (scenarios) of lights based on motion, door contacts and illuminance levels.

apps.name: Spruce Scheduler
apps.description: Setup schedules for Spruce irrigation controller

apps.name: Double Tap
apps.description: Turn on or off any number of switches when an existing switch is tapped twice in a row.

apps.name: Presence Change Push
apps.description: Get a push notification when a SmartSense Presence tag or smartphone arrives at or departs from a location.

apps.name: Safe Watch
apps.description: Watch a series of sensors for any anomalies for securing a safe.

apps.name: Bose SoundTouch (Connect)
apps.description: Control your Bose SoundTouch speakers

apps.name: Whole House Fan
apps.description: Toggle a whole house fan (switch) when: Outside is cooler than inside, Inside is above x temp, Thermostat is off

apps.name: ObyThing Music (Connect)
apps.description: Use this free SmartApp in conjunction with the ObyThing Music app for your Mac to control and automate music and more with iTunes and SmartThings.

apps.name: Light Up the Night
apps.description: Turn your lights on when it gets dark and off when it becomes light again.

apps.name: Speaker Weather Forecast
apps.description: Play a weather report through your Speaker when the mode changes or other events occur

apps.name: Bon Voyage
apps.description: Monitors a set of SmartSense Presence tags or smartphones and triggers a mode change when everyone has left.  Used in conjunction with Big Turn Off or Make It So to turn off lights, appliances, adjust the thermostat, turn on security apps, and more.

apps.name: Yoics (Connect)
apps.description: Connect and Control your Yoics Enabled Devices

apps.name: Camera Power Scheduler
apps.description: Turn the power on and off at a specific time.

apps.name: Single Button Controller
apps.description: Use your Aeon Panic Button to setup events when the button is used

apps.name: Hub IP Notifier
apps.description: Listen for local IP changes when your hub registers.

apps.name: Sunrise/Sunset
apps.description: Changes mode and controls lights based on local sunrise and sunset times.

apps.name: Enhanced Auto Lock Door
apps.description: Automatically locks a specific door after X minutes when closed  and unlocks it when open after X seconds.

apps.name: Thermostat Auto Off
apps.description: Automatically turn off thermostat when windows/doors open. Turn it back on when everything is closed up.

apps.name: Foscam (Connect)
apps.description: Connect and take pictures using your Foscam camera from inside the Smartthings app.

apps.name: Simple Sync Connect
apps.description: Integrate SmartThings with your Simple Control activities via Simple Sync.

apps.name: Garage Door Monitor
apps.description: Monitor your garage door and get a text message if it is open too long

apps.name: Scheduled Mode Change
apps.description: Changes mode at a specific time of day.

apps.name: Talking Alarm Clock
apps.description: Control up to 4 waking schedules using a Sonos speaker as an alarm.

apps.name: Rise and Shine
apps.description: Changes mode when someone wakes up after a set time in the morning.

apps.name: Curb Control
apps.description: This SmartApp allows you to interact with the switches in your physical graph through Curb.

apps.name: Humidity Alert!
apps.description: Notify me when the humidity rises above or falls below the given threshold. It will turn on a switch when it rises above the first threshold and off when it falls below the second threshold.

apps.name: Ubi
apps.description: Add your Ubi device to your SmartThings Account

apps.name: Elder Care: Slip & Fall
apps.description: Monitors motion sensors in bedroom and bathroom during the night and detects if occupant does not return from the bathroom after a specified period of time.

apps.name: Smart Humidifier
apps.description: Turn on/off humidifier based on relative humidity from a sensor.

apps.name: Hue (Connect)
apps.description: Allows you to connect your Philips Hue lights with SmartThings and control them from your Things area or Dashboard in the SmartThings Mobile app. Please update your Hue Bridge first, outside of the SmartThings app, using the Philips Hue app.

apps.name: Weather Windows
apps.description: Compares two temperatures – indoor vs outdoor, for example – then sends an alert if windows are open (or closed!). If you don't use an external temperature device, your zipcode will be used instead.

apps.name: Thermostat Window Check
apps.description: If your heating or cooling system come on, it gives you notice if there are any windows or doors left open, preventing the system from working optimally.

apps.name: Turn It On When It Opens
apps.description: Turn something on when an open/close sensor opens.
